mapper.sql: select bno, title, content, writer, view_cnt, comment_cnt, reg_date from t_board
mapper.delete: delete from t_board where bno = #{bno} and writer = #{writer}
mapper.insert: insert into t_board (title, content, writer) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: order by reg_date desc, bno desc limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset}
